commit message: Updated the version to 0.100
Fixed the progress indicator on the topplayer download button

Avoid that podcasts without a image shows a wrong image, now it jus doesn
t show anything
Switched app to using bugsnag as crash analytics tool
Testing some new Fresco caching on lolipop devices
Fixed indexoutofbounds exception
Removed an enum
Fixed nullpointer exception
Prevent nullpointer exception
Removed debugging code
First iteration of rewriting the playlist to a cooridinat layout
Ensured that we only scroll when movement is about the slopetreshold
Initial swipe to dismiss implementation
Added 'hearing' icon to the playlist when swiping episodes away. Added margin to the bottom of the snackbar
Ensured that the TopPlayer is always at least 'minimumSize'
Adjusted the playlist swipe background color to the matching episodes color
Changed the SDCardManager to use ContextCompat.getExternalFilesDirs for storing files
Updated the playlistFragment to use the FrescoHelper
Reenabled expanding playlist items
Made the icons in the subscription list square with rounded corners
Added a small gradient to the bottom of the TopPlayer
Enhanced the playlist scrolling experience
Fixed crash when using the seekbar
Switched to the new support navigation drawer
Bumped version number to 0.102
Various small UI fixes
Updated version to 102.2 (versioncode 156)
